EmailTemplate.description: sends student survey link when a case is closed
EmailTemplate.name: Student Case Closed Survey Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Student Case Closed (Case # {!Case.CaseNumber})
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Your Case # {!Case.CaseNumber} has been closed.
We appreciate your feedback. Please complete this short survey.
{!Case.SurveyInvitationLink__c}
Thank you
University of Phoenix 4035 S Riverpoint Pkwy, Phoenix, AZ 85040 (844) 937-8679
